data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهَ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.

data.meanings: sign, apparent sign, mark, indication, message, evidence, proof, miracle, communication, verse of The Quran. It properly signifies any apparent thing inseparable from a thing not equally apparent so that when one perceives the former, he perceives the other which he cannot perceive by itself.
data.sentence: The word يَاأَيُّهَا comes from the root ا ي ي and is associated with the meanings: sign, apparent sign, mark, indication, message, evidence, proof, miracle, communication, verse of The Quran. It properly signifies any apparent thing inseparable from a thing not equally apparent so that when one perceives the former, he perceives the other which he cannot perceive by itself.

data.meanings: it increased/augmented, the practicing/taking of usury, excess/addition, become high/grown up/large/swollen/risen, mount up, to grow/swell, out of breath. rabiyatun - ever-increasing, severe. arba (comp. form) - more numerous, more increased.
data.sentence: The word الرِّبَوا comes from the root ر ب و and is associated with the meanings: it increased/augmented, the practicing/taking of usury, excess/addition, become high/grown up/large/swollen/risen, mount up, to grow/swell, out of breath. rabiyatun - ever-increasing, severe. arba (comp. form) - more numerous, more increased.

data.meanings: to protect, save, preserve, ward off, guard against evil and calamity, be secure, take as a shield, regard the duty. muttaqii - one who guard against evil and against that which harms and injures and is regardful of his duty towards human beings and God.
data.sentence: The word اتَّقُوا comes from the root و ق ي and is associated with the meanings: to protect, save, preserve, ward off, guard against evil and calamity, be secure, take as a shield, regard the duty. muttaqii - one who guard against evil and against that which harms and injures and is regardful of his duty towards human beings and God.

data.meanings: to leave/forsake/neglect, fall upon, wound, cut in slices, let, desist.
data.sentence: The word وَذَرُوا comes from the root و ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: to leave/forsake/neglect, fall upon, wound, cut in slices, let, desist.
